short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens up selected text in LinkifyRussian

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a Russian text on any web page, click the extension icon and the text will automatically open up in LinkifyRussian that provides the powerful means to facilitate reading and understanding of the text for learners of Russian.
